verbs.description: Less than two hours before the Trump - Kim summit in Singapore , MSNBC ’s Hardball host Chris Matthews and [V: panelists] Elise Jordan and Bobby Ghosh declared that President Trump is a “ wannabe despot ” who wants to “ fulfill his fantasy ” by ruling the country with an iron fist while having more affection for dictators like North Korea ’s Kim Jong - un than U.S. allies .
